title: Wait until dark
creator_credit: Terence Young, Mel Ferrer and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: Susy is an independent and resourceful housewife learning to cope with her blindness resulted from a recent accident. Susy’s life changes drastically when she is terrorised by a group of criminals who believe she is in possession of a doll used by them to smuggle drugs into the country. Alone and cut off from the world outside, Susy must fight for her life against this group of ruthless criminals. Music by Henry Mancini. Cast includes: Audrey Hepburn, Alan Arkin, Richard Crenna, Eferm Zimbalist Jr. and Jack Weston.
